transcript:
Customer: sorry ki mobile charge karne mobile charge chale gaye to
Customer: hello ha bola tha
Executive: kya sir kaun bol raha hai
Customer: sir Manu Pathak ji bol rahe hain aap
Customer: nahi Manu Pathak ji ke pitaji hain hum
Executive: sir Manu Pathak ji ke pitaji hain ji sir main Pradeep bol raha hun India Mart head office se aapki company run hoti hai na Radha Krishna
Customer: Radha Krishna
Executive: ji ji sir mujhe ek cheez puchna tha ki jo aapke bete hain unka kya naam hai
Customer: Satendra naam hai
Executive: acha unka Satendra naam hai Satendra Manu kehte hain hum log
Executive: acha abhi baat kara rahe hain unse aapse
Customer: ha sir hum log na India Mart ke service ke liye phone kar rahe hain to phone hi nahi uthate sir
Customer: nahi abhi hum baat karwa de rahe hain
Executive: ha number par honge
Customer: abhi hum number ghar par de rahe hain idhar machine ke liye sunai nahi dega
Executive: acha abhi hum ghar par chal rahe hain 899 wala unhi ka number hai
Customer: 75 hai starting
(silence)
Customer: hello ha sir
Customer: ghar par to uske baad hum number aapko de rahe hain agar ghar par honge to baat karwa denge aapse
Executive: acha sir nahi thoda sa mujhe yahi jankari leni thi ki matlab India Mart pe jo service aa rahi hai aap dekhte ho ki aapke bete dekhte hain Satendra
Customer: nahi hamare bete dekhte hain
Executive: samay abhi primary number jo 75899 wala number hai na baat kar lijiye yahi par hai ji
Customer: ha dijiye India Mart ka service hello Satendra sahab namaskar
Customer: ha bataiye sir aap to phone hi nahi utha rahe ho
Customer: ha are bataiye malik Praveen bol raha hun India Mart se account manager
Customer: ha ha sir actually na service ke liye main phone kar raha hun ki us din dekho video meet aapse nahi ho pai thi aur bahut sari inquiry lag rahi hai jo aapke site se connect nahi ho pa rahi hai to usi ke liye mujhe aapse video meet connect karna hai sir thoda main bata dunga aapko guide kar dunga
Customer: bataiye aap mujhe ye batao sir ki primary number jo 75 wala number hai aur last mein 899 ye kiska hai aapka hai ya kiska hai
Customer: 75 se jo start hai bhai ka hai
Executive: acha wo aapke bhaiya ka hai
Customer: aur ye 87 jo start hai 87563 last mein
Customer: 875 last mein 63 hai na hamara hai ha acha ye aapka hai theek hai to India Mart ka jo account hai jo service wo kaun dekhta hai aapke bhaiya dekhte hain ki aap dekhte ho
Customer: bhaiya dekhte hain
Executive: bhaiya dekhte hain bhaiya pe lagaya tha phone to koi bachi uthai thi keh rahi hain ki mobile charge mein laga ke gaye hain kahin bahar
Customer: ha ha ha gaye honge jaise kal pahunche Prayagraj na
Executive: acha acha aaj pahunche to gaye honge ha dekho main phone kar raha hun aapse baat karenge ha
Executive: sir dekhiye do cheez hai jisko bhi service use karni hai to ya to wo apna primary number update kar de ki nahi hamare pass inquiry ya direct call aayegi to hum hi baat karenge customer se thoda sa kya hota hai na sir man lijiye koi customer phone kiya aap kisi ko requirement hai to response nahi jayega to thoda sa online mein wo negative feedback jata hai
Customer: ha ha theek na to ye cheez hoti hai ab dekho sir aap tak pahunchne ke liye mujhe kitna kam se kam 15 20 minute lag gaya theek hai to buyer ko to nahi dikhega na buyer to direct aapki company pe number pe phone lagayega nahi response hoga to dusre supplier ko pakdega theek hai ye cheez hai aap ye batao ki abhi kaisa service lead wag kaisa aa rahi hai hamare India Mart se
Customer: theek aa rahi hai
Executive: theek aa rahi hai ha lekin sir lead jo buylead hai buylead consume karna bahut kam ho gaya bahut kam uthate hain aap log lead
Customer: ha sir bahar se aa raha hai jaise isliye utha nahi pa rahe hain jaise order de nahi pa rahe hain
Executive: acha to aap mujhe bataye ki kahan kahan se aa rahi hai main usko band karwa deta hun aur ye bataye jo ye last mein 63 is pe aap whatsapp pe hain login
Customer: isme sir main whatsapp pe hun kal kya kiya jaise bhai mobile apna wo gira diya tha
Executive: acha to maine apna mobile use de diya to aaj main mobile fir lunga isliye apna sim chote mobile mein dala hun acha to aap log ke pass laptop ya desktop nahi hai
Customer: hai sir dukan pe hai main is samay ghar pe aa gaya hun dhan katwane dhan katwane aa gaye hain ha gaon pe to jis number se sir baat ho rahi hai us pe whatsapp hai acha
Executive: to bataye sir Satendra ji kaise hoga fir hum kaise help kare aapko
Customer: main abhi sir phone kar raha hun bhai se hmm wo aapse baat karega agar nahi ho payegi baat to main isi number se main tab tak aapse sampark banaunga ha waise maine 899 pe na message whatsapp kiya hai
Customer: to aap unko bol dijiyega ki Praveen ji ka aaya hoga message ek bari baat kar le main bhi to aapke local se hi hun udhar Azamgarh se hi sir ha bataya tha unko bhi bataya tha aapko bhi bataya tha shayad ek bar
Executive: theek hai theek hai sir main usko connect kar raha hun abhi ha theek na ha ha connect se boliye fir main karwata hun thoda help karta hun aapko service kaise uthani hai consume karna theek hai sir theek hai sir theek hai namaste ha proper tarike se namaste ji
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not able to consume buyleads.

- Customer's primary number is not updated.

- Customer is facing issues connecting with the executive.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to block unwanted leads.

- Executive explained the importance of updating primary number.

- Executive offered to help with service consumption.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect after customer talks to his brother.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, primary number, service, account, whatsapp
